title: Disclaimer
description: Important ‚Äî This wiki was initially bootstrapped with AI-generated content. It may contain inaccuracies; we rely on the community to keep it up to date and accurate.
content:
## Important notice

This wiki started with an initial set of pages generated by Artificial Intelligence. While this helped us cover many sections quickly, there may be **incomplete, outdated, or inaccurate information**.

Our goal is for this wiki to be a living, reliable reference for the game‚Äôs current state. To achieve that, we **rely on the volunteer work of the community** ‚Äî players, testers, and contributors who keep pages up to date.

## How you can help

* Review pages you‚Äôre familiar with and fix any incorrect information.
* Add recent details after game updates and patches.
* Fill in missing sections (recipes, locations, stats, mechanics, etc.).
* Report inconsistencies by leaving feedback or opening a PR.

## Reporting and contributing

* To edit this or any page, use the ‚ÄúEdit page‚Äù link on the right-hand side.
* Read the contribution guide here: [How to Contribute](/docs/how-to-contribute).

Thank you for helping make the wiki more useful and accurate for everyone.

title: Welcome to Stepcraft
content:
## What is Stepcraft?

Stepcraft is a mobile RPG that combines classic fantasy elements with modern gameplay mechanics. You'll:

* **Master Skills:** Develop expertise in combat, crafting, gathering, and social interactions
* **Explore the World:** Discover diverse regions, from mystical forests to ancient ruins
* **Complete Quests:** Follow engaging storylines and help NPCs with their challenges
* **Craft Equipment:** Create weapons, armor, and tools to enhance your abilities
* **Battle Enemies:** Face off against a variety of creatures and monsters

## Getting Started

### 1. Learn the Basics

* **Movement:** Navigate the world by tapping locations on your map
* **Skills:** Practice different skills to level up and unlock new abilities
* **Inventory:** Manage your items, equipment, and resources
* **Quests:** Accept and complete missions

### 2. First Mission

1. **Learn Basic Skills:** Try gathering, crafting, and combat
2. **Explore Your Starting Area:** Familiarize yourself with local locations
3. **Complete Quests:** Follow available storylines and help NPCs

## Can I contribute?

Yes! This Wiki is primarily maintained by the community. Make your contributions by clicking the "Edit page" link on right hand side of a page.

title: How to Contribute
description: Learn how to contribute to the Stepcraft Wiki and help the community grow
content:
Welcome to the Stepcraft Wiki community! We're excited that you want to help make this knowledge base even better. Contributing is easy and doesn't require any technical expertise.

## üöÄ Quick Start - Two Ways to Help

### 1. Edit Any Page Directly

The easiest way to contribute:

1. **Navigate to any page** you'd like to improve
2. **Click "Edit Page"** in the sidebar (Community section)
3. **Make your changes** using GitHub's web editor
4. **Submit your changes** - we'll review and merge them!

### 2. Report Issues or Give Feedback

Found something wrong or have suggestions?

1. **Click "Give Feedback"** on any page
2. **Describe the issue** or improvement you'd like to see
3. **Submit** - we'll address it as soon as possible

## üìù What Kind of Contributions Do We Need?

### üîß Quick Fixes

* Fix typos, grammar, or formatting
* Update outdated information
* Add missing details to existing pages
* Improve clarity and readability

### üìö Content Additions

* Document new items, resources, or skills
* Create guides for game mechanics
* Add location information and maps
* Write enemy strategies and tips

### üêõ Bug Reports

* Report broken links or missing images
* Point out incorrect information
* Suggest improvements to page layout

## üìñ Writing Guidelines

### Content Style

* **Be clear and concise** - explain things simply
* **Stay accurate** - base information on current game version
* **Be helpful** - think about what players need to know
* **Link related content** - connect pages together

### Formatting Tips

Every page should start with this structure:

```markdown
---
title: "Your Page Title"
description: "Brief description for search results"
---

# Your Page Title

Your content here...

## Main Sections
Use ## for major sections

### Subsections  
Use ### for smaller sections
```

### Using Tables

Great for stats, recipes, and structured data:

```markdown
| Item | Level | Damage |
|------|-------|--------|
| Iron Sword | 10 | 25 |
| Steel Sword | 20 | 45 |
```

### Adding Links

Link to other wiki pages:

```markdown
[Iron Ore](/docs/resources/individual/iron_ore)
[Mining Skill](/docs/skills/individual/mining)
```

## ‚úÖ Mark Pages as Verified (lastVerified)

We now support a verification badge to indicate that a page has been recently reviewed by a human contributor.

### What it does

* When you add `lastVerified` to the page frontmatter, a checkmark icon appears next to the page title.
* Hovering the icon shows a tooltip like ‚ÄúVerified on YYYY-MM-DD‚Äù.

### When to use it

* After you have reviewed the page for accuracy against the current game version or patch.
* After updating content that was previously outdated or incomplete.

### Recommended format

* Use ISO date format: `YYYY-MM-DD` (e.g., `2025-08-10`).

### How to add it

Add `lastVerified` to the frontmatter at the top of the file:

```markdown
---
title: "Your Page Title"
description: "Brief description for search results"
keywords: [tag1, tag2]
lastVerified: 2025-08-10
---
```

That‚Äôs it ‚Äî the page will display a green check icon next to the title.

## üéØ Page Organization

Our wiki is organized into these main sections:

* **Getting Started** - New player guides
* **Skills** - All 15 skills with guides and recipes
* **Items** - Weapons, armor, tools, and consumables
* **Resources** - Raw materials and crafting components
* **Map** - Locations, areas, and where to find things
* **Enemies** - Monster guides and combat strategies

## ü§ù Community Guidelines

### Be Respectful

* Use friendly, helpful language
* Welcome different playstyles and strategies
* Provide constructive feedback

### Collaborate Well

* Write clear descriptions in your contributions
* Respond to feedback positively
* Help other contributors when you can

## üõ† Advanced Contributing

### Local Development (Optional)

If you want to preview changes on your computer:

1. Fork the repository on GitHub
2. Clone it to your computer
3. Install dependencies: `npm install`
4. Run locally: `npm run dev`
5. View at `http://localhost:3000`

### File Structure

Content is organized like this:

```
contents/docs/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ skills/individual/           # Individual skill pages
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ items/individual/            # Individual item pages  
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ resources/individual/        # Individual resource pages
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ map/individual/              # Individual location pages
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ enemies/individual/          # Individual enemy pages
```

## üèÜ Recognition

All contributors are recognized through:

* **Git history** showing your contributions
* **GitHub profile** linked to your changes
* **Community appreciation** for your help

## üìû Need Help?

### Getting Started

* Review existing pages for examples
* Start with small edits to get familiar
* Don't worry about making mistakes - we can fix them!

### Questions?

* Use "Give Feedback" on this page for questions
* Check out existing issues on GitHub
* Look at recent contributions for examples

## üéÆ Why Contribute?

The Stepcraft Wiki is a **community-driven project**. Every contribution helps:

* **New players** learn the game faster
* **Experienced players** discover new strategies
* **Everyone** have access to accurate, up-to-date information
* **The community** grow and thrive together

Your knowledge and experience make this wiki valuable for everyone!

***

## Ready to Start?

1. **Find a page** you'd like to improve
2. **Click "Edit Page"** in the sidebar
3. **Make your changes**
4. **Submit** and become part of the community!

Thank you for helping make the Stepcraft Wiki better for everyone! üéâ

title: Individual Item Pages
description: All Stepcraft items as individual pages for detailed information
content:
# Individual Item Pages

This directory contains individual pages for all 172 items in Stepcraft. Each item has its own dedicated page with detailed information, stats, and requirements.

## Categories Generated

Based on the extracted data, pages have been generated for items across these categories:

* **Tools** - Mining, woodcutting, and harvesting tools
* **Food** - Consumable food items for health restoration
* **Potions** - Alchemical potions with temporary effects
* **Rings** - Wearable rings with stat bonuses
* **Amulets** - Necklaces and amulets with magical properties
* **Armor** - Protective equipment (helmets, chest, legs, gloves, boots)
* **Weapons** - Combat weapons and off-hand items
* **Quest Items** - Special items for quests and story progression
* **Jams** - Special consumable items

## Search Integration

These pages are automatically indexed by the search system, making all items easily discoverable through the search functionality.

## Navigation

* [‚Üê Back to Items Catalog](/items)
* [Browse Complete Catalog](/items)

title: World Map & Regions
description: Explore all the regions and locations in the world of Stepcraft - discover where to find resources, practice skills, and encounter enemies
content:
## Overview The world is divided into distinct regions, each with its own character, resources, and activities. Some locations have both main areas and outskirt regions that offer different levels of resources and challenges.

[Silverleaf Refuge](/docs/map/individual/silverleaf_refuge)

A serene island sanctuary where ancient silverleaf trees grow beside crystal-clear waters.

Fishing Woodcutting

[Verdant Isle](/docs/map/individual/verdant_isle)

The largest island in the southern waters, blessed with abundant life and diverse activities.

Fishing Woodcutting Foraging Hunting

[Willowbend Plaza](/docs/map/individual/willowbend_plaza)

The bustling heart of village life, where craft halls and workshops cluster around the central market.

Cooking Smithing Crafting Trinketry

[Ironheart Cliffs](/docs/map/individual/ironheart_cliffs)

Towering cliffs of red stone where the rarest ores hide deep within the rock face.

Mining Woodcutting

[Crimson Garden](/docs/map/individual/crimson_garden)

A hidden orchard where fruit trees grow wild, their leaves forever tinged red by ancient magic.

Foraging Woodcutting

[Sunforge Sands](/docs/map/individual/sunforge_sands)

A wasteland of scorching dunes that separates elven and dwarven lands.

Crafting Combat Alchemy
## All Regions ### üåä Coastal & Water Regions

[Silverleaf Refuge](/docs/map/individual/silverleaf_refuge)

Mystical island with silverleaf trees

Fishing Woodcutting

[Verdant Isle](/docs/map/individual/verdant_isle)

Largest southern island

Fishing Woodcutting Foraging Hunting

[Pearlsand Strand](/docs/map/individual/pearlsand_strand)

Where river meets sea

Fishing Foraging

[Crystalrun River](/docs/map/individual/crystalrun_river)

Magical sparkling waters

Fishing Woodcutting

[Moonmere](/docs/map/individual/moonmere)

Peaceful night-sky reflecting lake

Fishing Woodcutting Foraging
### ‚õ∞Ô∏è Mountain & Mining Regions

[Titan's Rest](/docs/map/individual/titans_rest)

Mineral-rich titan burial ground

Mining Woodcutting

[Ironheart Cliffs](/docs/map/individual/ironheart_cliffs)

Towering red stone cliffs

Mining Woodcutting
### üå∏ Village & Civilized Areas

[Willowbend Plaza](/docs/map/individual/willowbend_plaza)

Bustling village market center

Cooking Smithing Crafting Trinketry

[Heart Grove](/docs/map/individual/heart_grove)

Sacred center of Willow's Reach

Alchemy

[Blooming Glade](/docs/map/individual/blooming_glade)

Vibrant meadows around the village

Foraging Woodcutting Farming
### üå≥ Forest & Natural Areas

[Crimson Garden](/docs/map/individual/crimson_garden)

Hidden magical orchard

Foraging Woodcutting

[Mycelwood Thicket](/docs/map/individual/mycelwood_thicket)

Dense mushroom woodland

Foraging Woodcutting Hunting
### ‚öîÔ∏è Dangerous Areas

[Thornspire Ruins](/docs/map/individual/thornspire_ruins)

Haunted elven watchtower ruins

Woodcutting Foraging Combat

[Hollow Crown](/docs/map/individual/hollow_crown)

Corrupted ancient meeting hall

Crafting Combat Alchemy

[Sunforge Sands](/docs/map/individual/sunforge_sands)

Scorching wasteland dunes

Crafting Combat Alchemy
## Activities by Skill ### üé£ Fishing Locations * [Silverleaf Refuge](/docs/map/individual/silverleaf_refuge) - Salmon, catfish, bass, and rare eldritch bass * [Verdant Isle](/docs/map/individual/verdant_isle) - Flying fish, octopus, pufferfish, and cycloptopus * [Pearlsand Strand](/docs/map/individual/pearlsand_strand_docks) - Deep-water catches like swordfish and lobster * [Crystalrun River](/docs/map/individual/crystalrun_river) - Trout, pike, and mystical sea snakes * [Moonmere](/docs/map/individual/moonmere) - Lake fish including tilapia and rainbow fish ### ‚õèÔ∏è Mining Locations * [Titan's Rest](/docs/map/individual/titans_rest) - Basic ores: stone, copper, iron, red ore * [Ironheart Cliffs](/docs/map/individual/ironheart_cliffs) - Rare ores: silver, gold, blue ore, red ore ### üåø Foraging Areas * [Crimson Garden](/docs/map/individual/crimson_garden) - Exotic fruits and berries * [Verdant Isle](/docs/map/individual/verdant_isle) - Tropical fruits: pear, lemon, kiwi, apricot * [Pearlsand Strand](/docs/map/individual/pearlsand_strand) - Coastal finds: banana, coconut, starfish * [Moonmere](/docs/map/individual/moonmere) - Complete variety of forageable items ### ‚öîÔ∏è Combat Zones * [Thornspire Ruins](/docs/map/individual/thornspire_ruins) - Ghosts and rats * [Hollow Crown](/docs/map/individual/hollow_crown) - Slimes, mushrooms, and ents * [Sunforge Sands](/docs/map/individual/sunforge_sands) - Elemental beings and golems ### üè† Crafting Hubs * [Willowbend Plaza](/docs/map/individual/willowbend_plaza) - All crafting skills available * [Hollow Crown](/docs/map/individual/hollow_crown) - Crafting and alchemy in ancient workshops * [Sunforge Sands](/docs/map/individual/sunforge_sands) - Advanced crafting in harsh conditions ## Navigation * [Browse All Locations](/docs/map/individual) * [Resources Catalog](/docs/resources) * [Enemy Bestiary](/docs/enemies) * [Search All Content](/search)

title: Blooming Glade
description: Blooming Glade - Explore this region in Stepcraft
content:
# Blooming Glade

Vibrant meadows surrounding the village and Heart Grove, where wildflowers carpet the earth. The community farms thrive here, blessed by the grove's influence and tended by generations of elven farmers.

**Type:** Main Region **Danger Level:** Safe **Activities:** 3
## Location Overview Vibrant meadows surrounding the village and Heart Grove, where wildflowers carpet the earth. title: Silverleaf Refuge

title: Skills Catalog
description: Master all 15 skills in Stepcraft - from gathering and crafting to combat and social abilities
content: ## All Skills | Skill | Name | Description | |:-----:|:-----|:------------| | | **Farming** | Cultivate crops and manage agricultural activities. Sustainable food production and resource management. | | | **Fishing** | Cast your line to catch various fish species from different water bodies. A peaceful way to gather food. | | | **Foraging** |Gather wild plants, mushrooms, and natural resources from the wilderness. Knowledge of nature is key. | | | **Hunting** | Track and hunt wild animals for meat, hides, and other valuable materials. | | | **Logging** | Fell trees to obtain logs for construction and crafting. Different tree types yield different wood qualities. | | | **Mining** | Extract valuable ores and gems from the earth using pickaxes. Higher skill levels unlock access to rare materials. | | | **Alchemy** | Brew powerful potions and elixirs using magical ingredients. Master alchemists can create miraculous concoctions. | | | **Carpentry** |Work with wood to create planks, handles, and wooden items. Essential for tool crafting and construction. | | | **Cooking** | Prepare delicious and nutritious meals from raw ingredients. Cooked food provides better health restoration. | | | **Crafting** | Combine materials and components to create advanced tools, weapons, and equipment. | | | **Smithing** | Transform raw ores into refined bars and craft powerful weapons, armor, and tools at the forge. | | | **Trinketry** | Craft beautiful jewelry and accessories from precious gems and metals. | | | **Agility** | Improve movement speed, reflexes, and dexterity through training and practice. | | | **Combat** | Master the arts of war, weapon handling, and tactical combat skills. | | | **Reputation** | Build relationships with NPCs and factions. Higher reputation unlocks special opportunities and rewards. |
